name: Tonba
body:
### Introduction
Tonba is a revolutionary redesign of Bitcoin that aims to standardize the new generation of digital decentralized currency. Like other cryptocurrencies before it, Tonba utilizes peer-to-peer technology, while aiming to provide a faster and more secure system to handle your transactions.

### Features
* Proof of Fortune
* Green Mining
* More powerful and extensible payment scheme
* Capital risk-free pooled mining
* Secure thin client
* Upgradable Protocol
* And much more ...

### Get Started
This is still under construction...

### Contact Us
Questions? Comments?  
Feel free to email us at email@tonba.org  
Follow [@TonbaOrg](https://twitter.com/tonbaorg) on Twitter for all the latest updates  
Like us on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/tonba.org)
